attributes.action: Prioritise vaccinations for early years teachers.
attributes.additional_details: Vaccinate early years staff now all other schools are closed. We need protection towards coronavirus if we are to stay open.
attributes.background: All schools have been forced closed till mid Feb but early years have been left stranded again with no mention of the risk to teachers and children under 4. We can get ill too with more staff being at risk for catching the virus due to the ratio of staff to children.  Don't we count towards anything

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Prioritise early years practitioners to urgently receive Covid 19 vaccine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566743

Prioritise teachers, school and childcare staff for Covid-19 vaccination: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554316
